details.description_text: Audio: Realtek High Definition Audio 3.5mm Headphone / Mic Jack Operating System: Windows 11 Pro (Trial) Qbits Sigma X2 Laptop with Intel Core i5 12th Gen Processor16GB RAM and 1TB M.2 NVMe SSD PCIe 4.0Display: 15.6 Inches FHD IPS DisplayGraphics: Intel® Iris® Xe GraphicsCamera: 1 MP (720p Webcam)Ports & Connectors: 2 X M.2, 2 X SODIMM, 1 x HDMI, 1 x LAN, 2 x USB 3.1 & 1 x USB 2.0, 1 x Type-C Port, 1 x 3.5mm Headphone/Mic Jack Qbits Sigma X2 Laptop Intel® Core™ i5-1240P Processor with 16 GB RAM, 1.70 GHz to 4.40 GHz, 12MB Intel® Smart Cache, 12 Cores, 16 Threads, Integrated Intel® Iris Xe GraphicsMORE SPEED AND POWER EFFICIENCY The Sigma X2 comes equipped with a powerful 12th-generation processor making it more capable. it brings more power to go and allows you to rip through workflows. The Intel® Xe Graphics makes screen time a whole new experience while delivering transformational GPU and greater speed for designers and creators. Let's enjoy next-gen power efficiency and visual amazement.FULL HD IPS DISPLAY With the breathtaking 15.6" Full HD IPS Display with 1920 x 1080 pixels the new laptop delivers exceptional color accuracy. It produces a high contrast ratio to ensure text is sharp, and images and videos are more brilliant. Whether you are watching movies, videos, or music, this gorgeous nearly bezel-free NanoEdge display brings color to life and enables you to experience exceptions.FASTER MEMORY AND STORAGE Experience the potential of Western Digital NVMe SSD in the Sigma X2, offering enhanced data reliability, a remarkable 40% boost in speed, and an impressive 20% increase in power efficiency compared to the previous generation. It's not just storage; it's your gateway to ample room for projects, documents, photos, music, videos, and more – all accessible in an instant. BUILT-IN FINGERPRINT SENSORA single touch on the sensor allows you to instantly unlock and access your notebook. The latest laptop has been designed to match your style, It has everything you need for the ultimate user experience. Built-in fingerprint for peace of mind ensures easy unlocking and utmost security. No need to remember a password every time you log in, an easy touch fingerprint sensor in the touchpad makes it easier and more secure to access.

Power Battery Type: Li-ion polymer battery, 56Wh Power Device Type: Type-C Adapter, 65W,100-240V Dimensions&Weight(Main Product) Product Size:315.6mm×220.4mm×17.25mm Net Weight:1.42kg (Include battery) 1 x RedmiBook 1 x US Charger (A right plug of adapter will be sent as your shipping country) 1 x Chinese User Manual Xiaomi RedmiBook Pro 14 Ryzen 7 5700U 14″ Laptop – GreyThe Xiaomi RedmiBook Pro 14 comes with AMD Ryzen 7 5700U (8MB L3 cache, 8 cores, 16 threads, 1.8GHz Up to 4.3GHz) and 16 GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM. It comes with a 512 GB PCIe SSD. This laptop has been integrated with AMD Radeon Graphics and has a 14 Inch (2560 x 1600) FHD, 178°, 300nits, 16:10, 100% sRGB display. It also has a full-size backlit keyboard, 1.3mm key travel, 125mm x 81.6mm, PTP trackpad. Xiaomi RedmiBook Pro 14 runs on Windows 10 Home operating system. It is powered by a 56Whr Non-Removable Lithium-ion battery and comes with a Type-C Adapter, 65W,100-240V. This laptop features Built-in AKG Speaker and microphone. It also has an HD Webcam. The RedmiBook Pro 14 is equipped with WiFi 6, support 2.4Ghz and 5GHz; 802.11 AX, compatible with 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac; and Bluetooth 5.1 for network & wireless connectivity. The laptop is designed with 1 x USB-C for charging and data transmission, Thunderbolt 4 x 1, USB 2.0 x 1, USB 3.2 Gen1 x 1, HDMI x 1ext. display at 60Hz, 1080p display up to 240Hz), 1 x USB-C, 1 x USB-A 3.2 Gen1, 1 x USB-A 2.0, 1 x 3.5mm audio jack. detail.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i 82H802M6IN 11th Gen Core i7 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6" FHD Laptop

details.description_text: CPU: Intel Core i7-1165G7RAM: 8GB Soldered DDR4-3200Storage: 512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe 3.0x4 NVMeIGPU: Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics Functions as UHD GraphicsDisplay: 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) 250nits Anti-glareThe Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i 82H802M6IN is a versatile and high-performing laptop designed for both productivity and entertainment. Powered by the 11th Generation Intel Core i7-1165G7 processor, it ensures seamless multitasking and fast processing speeds. This model features a large 15.6-inch Full HD TN display, delivering vibrant visuals and a comfortable viewing experience for work or streaming. With 8GB DDR4 RAM, expandable up to 12GB, and a fast 512GB SSD, the laptop offers ample memory and storage for your files, documents, and applications. Integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics provide smooth visuals for everyday computing and light graphics tasks. The laptop comes pre-installed with Windows 11 Home and features a slim, lightweight design for easy portability. It is equipped with multiple input/output ports, including USB 3.2, USB 2.0, HDMI, and an SD card reader, allowing flexible connectivity to external devices. The IdeaPad Slim 3i offers up to 7 hours of battery life, making it suitable for on-the-go use, and comes with a 2-year warranty for peace of mind.

product_name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L510KA-EJ923 Intel Celeron N4500 8GB RAM 256GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

detail.name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L510KA-EJ923 Intel Celeron N4500 8GB RAM 256GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: Intel Celeron N4500 Processor RAM: 8GB DDR4 Memory Storage: 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L510KA-EJ923 Intel Celeron N4500 8GB RAM 256GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by Intel Celeron N4500 processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB DDR4 on board. The laptop has a 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel HD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 200nits brightness.For a long time back up it has 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. It has the latest Wi-Fi 5(802.11ac) (Dual band) 2*2 + Bluetooth 5.1 Wireless Card for better wireless connectivity. This laptop has a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L510KA-EJ923 is packed with many special features such as a chiclet keyboard that helps in low-light areas, and a Trusted Platform Module (Firmware TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. Weighing at only 1.57 kg (3.46 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Peacock Blue of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes an adapter and a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

detail.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (82X700A7LK) 13th Gen Core-i3 Laptop

details.description_text: Certification: MIL-STD-810H military test passed (21 test items) Processor: 13th Gen Core i3-1305U Memory & Storage: 8GB LPDDR5 RAM, 512GB M.2 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe SSD IGPU: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920x1080) The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (8) 82X700A7LK is an ideal choice for students and professionals seeking reliability and performance in a sleek form factor. Powered by the latest 13th Generation Intel Core i3-1315U processor, this laptop is designed to deliver responsive everyday computing and productivity. It features a generous 8GB DDR4 RAM and a fast 512GB SSD, ensuring quick boot-ups and effortless multitasking. The 15.6" Full HD anti-glare display offers vibrant visuals and a comfortable viewing experience, whether you're working, streaming, or browsing. Intel UHD Graphics handles daily multimedia needs smoothly. The laptop is equipped with ample connectivity options including USB 3.2, USB Type-C, HDMI, and a headphone/mic combo jack, allowing easy connection to peripherals and external displays. Weighing just 1.62 kg, this slim and lightweight device is easy to carry, making it perfect for on-the-go use. Pre-installed with Windows 11 Home, the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i is ready to work and play right out of the box.

product_name: ASUS Vivobook 15 X1504VA-NJ739 13th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

detail.name: ASUS Vivobook 15 X1504VA-NJ739 13th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: 13th Gen Core i3-1315U RAM & Storage: 8GB DDR4 Memory, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certification: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook 15 X1504VA-NJ739 13th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by an Intel Core i3-1315U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It has 8GB DDR4 (Onboard) RAM and 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel UHD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250nits brightness.For a long time, the back-up has had 42WHrs, 3S1P, and a 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity, it has the latest Wi-Fi 6(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.2 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different.). This laptop has a 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, and 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences and online classes. ASUS Vivobook 15 X1504VA-NJ739 has many special features such as a chiclet keyboard, a precision Touchpad, and a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing in at only 1.70 kg (3.75 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Quiet Blue of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

product_name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 Intel Core i3-N305 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

detail.name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 Intel Core i3-N305 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: Intel Core i3-N305 Processor RAM & Storage: 8GB DDR4, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certifications: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 Intel Core i3-N305 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by an Intel Core i3-N305 Processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB DDR4 onboard. The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel UHD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250 nits of brightness.For a long time, backup it has a 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity, it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version differences.). This laptop has a Built-in speaker and array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences and online classes. ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 is packed with many special features, such as a backlit chiclet keyboard that helps in low-light areas, and a Trusted Platform Module (Firmware TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing in at only 1.63 kg (3.59 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Mixed Black of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a ø4.5, 45W AC Adapter, a Laptop, and a user manual. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

product_name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (82RK00ULIN) 12TH Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD Laptop

detail.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (82RK00ULIN) 12TH Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD Laptop

details.description_text: CPU: Intel Core i3-1215U RAM: 8GB Soldered DDR4-3200 Storage: 512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe IGPU: Integrated Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) 250nits Anti-glare The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (82RK00ULIN) is a sleek and efficient 15.6‑inch laptop, ideal for students, professionals, and anyone seeking dependable daily performance. It is powered by a 12th Gen Intel Core i3‑1215U (2 performance cores + 4 efficiency cores, up to 4.40 GHz), delivering solid responsiveness for tasks like browsing, streaming, document editing, and light multitasking.With 8 GB DDR4‑3200 RAM soldered onboard and room for expansion up to 16 GB via an open SO‑DIMM slot, you have enough memory to handle multiple apps smoothly. A speedy 512 GB M.2 NVMe SSD ensures fast startup, quick file access, and ample storage for your photos, videos, and software .The 15.6‑inch FHD (1920×1080) anti‑glare display offers crisp visuals with decent brightness (~250 nits), making it suitable for both indoor environments and well‑lit rooms.Graphics are handled by integrated Intel UHD, enough for everyday media and light photo editing.Its thin profile (≈19.9 mm) and light weight (~1.63 kg) make it easy to carry around.The laptop features a practical port selection USB‑C (data, power, DisplayPort), USB‑A, HDMI—for flexible connectivity . You’ll also find an HD webcam with a privacy shutter, stereo speakers with Dolby Audio, Wi‑Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, and a 45 Wh battery offering all‑day productivity.Overall, the IdeaPad Slim 3i delivers a well-rounded blend of performance, storage, portability, and features an excellent value for users needing a reliable and stylish laptop for everyday use.

product_name: ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 12th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

detail.name: ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 12th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: 12th Gen Core i3-1215U RAM & Storage: 8GB DDR4, 512GBM.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certifications: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 12th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by an Intel Core i3-1215U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It has 8GB DDR4 (OnBoard). The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel UHD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250nits brightness.For a long time back up it has 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth® 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different.). This laptop has a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 has many special features such as a chiclet keyboard, and a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing at only 1.70 kg (3.75 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Quiet Blue of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

details.description_text: Processor Brand - AMD Processor Model - Ryzen 5 7430U Generation - Ryzen 7000 Series Processor Frequency - up to 4.3GHz Processor Core - 6 cores Processor Thread - 12T CPU Cache - 16MB Display Size - 15.6-inch Display Type - TFT Display Resolution - FHD (1920x1080) Touch Screen - No Refresh Rate - 60Hz Display Features - LED Backlit, Aspect ratio: 16:9, Glare: Anti-glare, Screen-to-body ratio: 91% Brightness - 300nits Peak Brightness, 45% NTSC color gamut RAM - 16GB RAM Type - DDR4 Removable - No Bus Speed - 3200 MHz Max RAM Capacity - 32GB Storage Type - M.2 2280 NVME PCI-e 3 Storage Capacity - 512GB Graphics Model - AMD Radeon Graphics Graphics Memory - Shared Keyboard Type - Chiclet Keyboard With Independent numeric key, with UV coating TouchPad - Precision touchpad with the dualpoint butto WebCam - 1 MP Speaker - Build-in two speakers (4Ω/2W) Microphone - Built-in array microphone Audio Features - Realtek ALC269QN-VC3-GR(VB6/VC3), Support DTS Card Reader - TF card x1 HDMI Port - HDMI 1.4 x1 USB 2 Port - USB 3.2 Gen2 x1 (speed 10Gbps), USB 3.2 Gen1 x1 ( speed 5Gbps) USB Type-C / Thunderbolt Port - Type-C x1 (Charge &data & display) Headphone & Microphone Port - 3.5 Jack CTIA *1 LAN - RJ45x1, Support 1000Mbps WiFi - 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac Bluetooth - Bluetooth 5.1 Fingerprint Sensor - Yes Security Locker Slot - Kensington Lock Camera Privacy Shutter - Yes Operating System - Free Dos Battery Type - 3-cell Li-Poly Battery Capacity - 70WHrs Adapter Type - 65W 20V/3.25A AC adapator with Type-C Charge, cable 1.8m Color - Silver Dimensions - 359.5×251.5×17.7mm Weight - Weight (with Battery): Around 1.67kg, Weight (without Battery): Around 1.4kg Warranty Details - 02 years Warranty (Battery & Adapter 1 Year) Tecno MEGABOOK K15SDA AMD Ryzen 5 7430U 15.6″ FHD LaptopThe Tecno MEGABOOK K15SDA Laptop is a sleek and high-performance device designed for professionals, students, and everyday users who need both power and portability. Powered by the AMD Ryzen 5 7430U processor from the Ryzen 7000 Series, this Tecno MEGABOOK K15SDA Ryzen 5 Laptop features 6 cores, 12 threads, 16MB L3 cache, and speeds of up to 4.3GHz for smooth multitasking and efficient performance. It comes with 16GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM (non-removable, expandable up to 32GB) and a fast 512GB M.2 PCIe 3.0 NVMe SSD, ensuring quick data access and ample storage for work and entertainment. The Tecno MEGABOOK K15SDA Ryzen 5 15.6″ Laptop sports a 15.6-inch TFT Full HD (1920×1080) LED-backlit display with 300nits brightness, anti-glare coating, 45% NTSC color gamut, and an impressive 91% screen-to-body ratio for immersive viewing. Graphics are handled by integrated AMD Radeon Graphics, ideal for smooth visuals and light creative tasks. The laptop also includes a chiclet keyboard with UV coating, a precision touchpad with dual-point buttons, and enhanced security features like a fingerprint sensor, Kensington lock slot, and privacy shutter for its 1MP webcam. Audio is delivered through dual 4Ω/2W speakers with DTS support and a built-in array microphone. Connectivity options are abundant, including RJ45 Gigabit LAN, Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 5.1, USB 3.2 Gen2 (10Gbps), USB 3.2 Gen1 (5Gbps), USB Type-C (charging, data, and display), HDMI 1.4, TF card slot, and a 3.5mm audio jack. Running on FreeDOS, the Tecno MEGABOOK K15SDA is powered by a 3-cell 70WHrs Li-Poly battery with a 65W Type-C charger for fast, efficient charging. Its slim 17.7mm profile, elegant silver finish, and lightweight 1.67kg build make it the perfect choice for those who value both style and performance.

(Terms & Conditions Apply As Per HP, Battery Adapter 1 year).DescriptionHP ProBook 440 G10 Core i7 13th Gen 14″ FHD LaptopThe HP ProBook 440 G10 is an effective 14-inch laptop intended for professional productivity and security. The 13th-generation Intel Core i7-1355U processor, with up to 4.6 GHz using Intel Turbo Boost Technology, offers quick performance. It’s complemented with 8GB of DDR4-3200MHz RAM and a fast 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD. The HP ProBook 440 G10’s 14″ FHD IPS display with minimal bezels and anti-glare coating produces crisp visuals at 250 nits brightness, making it perfect for work and entertainment consumption. This laptop is extremely lightweight, weighing only 1.38 kg and measuring 32.19 x 21.39 x 1.99 cm. It includes the HP Premium Keyboard, which is spill-resistant and illuminated for better usage. The HP Long Life 3-cell, 51 Wh Li-ion battery allows for longer use, while Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX211 and Bluetooth 5.3 offer seamless connectivity. HP Cloud Recovery and the HP Client Management Script Library are two management features. Security is prioritized with features such as HP Sure Click, HP Sure Sense, and the inbuilt TPM 2.0 security chip. The Laptop also has a fingerprint sensor for additional biometric security. The HP ProBook 440 G10 is not only a powerhouse for professionals, but it also promotes sustainability by using low-halogen materials, recycled plastic, and ocean-bound plastic in its design. This laptop’s quality look and sturdy features make it a dependable choice for corporate customers.

(Terms & Conditions Apply As Per HP, Battery Adapter 1 year).DescriptionHP ProBook 440 G10 Core i7 13th Gen 14″ FHD LaptopThe HP ProBook 440 G10 is an effective 14-inch laptop intended for professional productivity and security. The 13th-generation Intel Core i7-1355U processor, with up to 4.6 GHz using Intel Turbo Boost Technology, offers quick performance. It’s complemented with 8GB of DDR4-3200MHz RAM and a fast 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD. The HP ProBook 440 G10’s 14″ FHD IPS display with minimal bezels and anti-glare coating produces crisp visuals at 250 nits brightness, making it perfect for work and entertainment consumption. This laptop is extremely lightweight, weighing only 1.38 kg and measuring 32.19 x 21.39 x 1.99 cm. It includes the HP Premium Keyboard, which is spill-resistant and illuminated for better usage. The HP Long Life 3-cell, 51 Wh Li-ion battery allows for longer use, while Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX211 and Bluetooth 5.3 offer seamless connectivity. HP Cloud Recovery and the HP Client Management Script Library are two management features. Security is prioritized with features such as HP Sure Click, HP Sure Sense, and the inbuilt TPM 2.0 security chip. The Laptop also has a fingerprint sensor for additional biometric security. The HP ProBook 440 G10 is not only a powerhouse for professionals, but it also promotes sustainability by using low-halogen materials, recycled plastic, and ocean-bound plastic in its design. This laptop’s quality look and sturdy features make it a dependable choice for corporate customers.

detail.name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 OLED E1504FA-L1245W Ryzen 3 7320U 8GB RAM 512 SSD 15.6" OLED Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 7320U RAM & Storage: 8GB LPDDR5 Memory, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certification: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook Go 15 OLED E1504FA-L1245W Ryzen 3 7320U 8GB RAM 512 SSD 15.6" OLED Laptop is powered by a Ryzen 3 7320U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB LPDDR5 on board. The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The AMD Radeon Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 400nits brightness and 600nits HDR peak brightness.For a long time back up it has 50WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different). This laptop has a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-inThe 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook Go 15 OLED E1504FA-L1245W is packed with many special features such as a backlit chiclet keyboard that helps in low-light areas, and a Trusted Platform Module (Firmware TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing at only 1.63 kg (3.59 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The genuine Windows 11 Home is preloaded on this laptop. The Mixed Black of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

It is powered by the 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13420H processor, featuring 8 cores and 12 threads with speeds up to 4.6GHz. This makes it ideal for students, professionals, and anyone who needs fast and reliable computing on the go. With 16GB of LPDDR4 onboard RAM, the laptop offers seamless multitasking and fast app performance. The 512GB M.2 SSD ensures quick boot times, faster data access, and plenty of storage for documents, media, and software. The 14-inch Full HD display provides a crisp and vibrant viewing experience. It offers a 1920x1200 resolution, 300nits brightness, 100% sRGB color coverage, and a 72% NTSC colour gamut. The anti-glare panel and 90% screen-to-body ratio enhance your viewing comfort whether you're working or watching content. For graphics, the laptop comes with Intel UHD Graphics which handles everyday visuals and light creative tasks efficiently. The white backlit keyboard with four adjustable brightness levels lets you work comfortably in any lighting environment, while the smooth touchpad supports precise control. Connectivity is modern and fast with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.4. You also get a wide range of ports including two USB Type-C ports with charging, data, and display support, one USB 3.1 Gen 2 port, two USB 3.0 ports, and an HDMI 1.4 output. The 2MP webcam makes video calls clear, and the dual microphones ensure crisp audio capture. The Tecno MEGABOOK T1 14 also offers impressive audio with DTS X Ultra technology, dual 2W speakers, and Realtek audio codecs. Its 75Wh battery provides long-lasting power, while the 65W Type-C adapter supports fast charging with Power Delivery. Security features include a fingerprint reader, Firmware TPM, and a Kensington lock slot. The slim and lightweight design in stylish Space Grey, weighing only 1.39kg and measuring just 15.8mm thin, makes it easy to carry wherever you go. Preloaded with FreeDOS, the laptop allows users to install their preferred operating system. It comes with a 2-year warranty, giving you peace of mind and reliable support. The Tecno MEGABOOK T1 14 is a solid all-rounder built for performance, mobility, and modern computing.

details.description_text: Here are the highlights of the Chuwi HeroBook Plus:Large Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920×1080) IPS screen with vibrant colors and wide viewing angles. Powerful Performance: Intel Celeron N4020 processor (2 cores, up to 2.8 GHz) with 8GB LPDDR4 RAM for smooth multitasking. Fast Storage: 256GB M.2 SSD for quick boot times and plenty of storage for files and apps. Portable Design: Lightweight (1.6 kg) and slim (12mm), making it easy to carry around. Long Battery Life: 38Wh battery providing up to 8 hours of usage on a single charge. Windows 11: Pre-installed for a modern, user-friendly experience. Ample Connectivity: Dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.2, and multiple ports (USB 3.0, Type-C, HDMI, and more) for flexible device connections. Affordable Price: Great value for everyday computing needs. Chuwi HeroBook Plus – 15.6" FHD LaptopThe Chuwi HeroBook Plus is a lightweight and budget-friendly laptop designed to meet the needs of students, professionals, and everyday users. It combines a large display, efficient performance, and essential connectivity features in a sleek, portable form factor.Key SpecificationsDisplay: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920×1080) IPS screen with a 16:9 aspect ratio and 230 nits brightness, offering vibrant visuals and wide viewing angles.Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (2 cores, 2 threads) with a base frequency of 1.1 GHz and a turbo boost up to 2.8 GHz, providing efficient performance for everyday tasks.Graphics: Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 600, suitable for light multimedia consumption and casual gaming.Memory: 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, facilitating smooth multitasking and responsiveness.Storage: 256GB M.2 SSD, offering fast boot times and ample space for documents, applications, and media files.Battery: 38Wh Li-ion battery with up to 8 hours of usage and rapid charging capabilities.Operating System: Windows 11, providing a modern and user-friendly interface.Design & BuildWeighing approximately 1.6 kg and measuring just 12mm in thickness, the HeroBook Plus is designed for portability without compromising on durability. It combines a large display, efficient performance, and essential connectivity features in a sleek, portable form factor.Key SpecificationsDisplay: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920×1080) IPS screen with a 16:9 aspect ratio and 230 nits brightness, offering vibrant visuals and wide viewing angles.Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (2 cores, 2 threads) with a base frequency of 1.1 GHz and a turbo boost up to 2.8 GHz, providing efficient performance for everyday tasks.Graphics: Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 600, suitable for light multimedia consumption and casual gaming.Memory: 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, facilitating smooth multitasking and responsiveness.Storage: 256GB M.2 SSD, offering fast boot times and ample space for documents, applications, and media files.Battery: 38Wh Li-ion battery with up to 8 hours of usage and rapid charging capabilities.Operating System: Windows 11, providing a modern and user-friendly interface.Design & BuildWeighing approximately 1.6 kg and measuring just 12mm in thickness, the HeroBook Plus is designed for portability without compromising on durability. Its polycarbonate body ensures resistance to heat and impact, making it an ideal companion for students and professionals on the go.Connectivity & PortsWi-Fi: Dual-band 2.4GHz/5GHz Wi-Fi 802.11a/ac/b/g/n for fast and stable internet connections.Bluetooth: Bluetooth 4.2 for connecting peripherals and accessories.Ports:2 x USB 3.0 ports1 x USB 2.0 port1 x USB Type-C port1 x HDMI 1.4 port1 x 3.5mm audio jack1 x RJ45 LAN port1 x TF card readerThese ports ensure compatibility with a wide range of devices and peripherals.Additional FeaturesKeyboard: Full-sized chiclet keyboard with a large 6.57" touchpad for comfortable typing and navigation.Webcam: 2MP front-facing camera with a physical privacy shutter for secure video conferencing.Audio: Integrated speakers and dual microphones for clear audio during calls and media playback.

product_name: ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ698 12th Gen Core i5 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6" FHD Laptop

detail.name: ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ698 12th Gen Core i5 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6" FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U RAM & Storage: 8GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certifications: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ698 12th Gen Core i5 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6" FHD Laptop is powered by an Intel Core i5-1235U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB DDR4 on board. The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel UHD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250nits brightness.For a long time back up it has 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different.). This laptop has a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ698 is packed with many special features such as a chiclet keyboard, and a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing at only 1.70 kg (3.75 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Cool Silver of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

product_name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (8) (83EQ004HLK) 12th Gen Core-i5 Laptop

detail.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (8) (83EQ004HLK) 12th Gen Core-i5 Laptop

details.description_text: Certification: MIL-STD-810H military test passed (21 test items) Processor: 12th Gen Core i5-12450H Memory & Storage: 8GB LPDDR5 RAM, 512GB M.2 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe SSD IGPU: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 14.0-inch Full HD (1920x1080) Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (83EQ004HLK) 12th Gen Core-i5 Laptop is powered by the 12th Gen Intel Core i5-12450H processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB of Soldered LPDDR5-4800 memory. The laptop has 512GB M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Integrated Intel UHD Graphics ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 14" FHD (1920x1080) 250nits Anti-glare display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range.For a long time back up it has Integrated 47Wh battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6, 11ax 2x2, and Bluetooth 5.2 Wireless Card. This laptop comes with User-facing stereo speakers, 1.5W x2, optimized with Dolby Audio system, that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 (support data transfer, Power Delivery, and DisplayPort 1.2), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x Headphone/microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x Card reader and 1x Power connector.The HD 720p with Privacy Shutter webcam is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (83EQ004HLK) has special features such as a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. Weighing at only 1.37 kg (3.02 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. The Abyss Blue of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes Laptop, 65W Round Tip (3-pin) power adapter, and user manuals. For peace of mind, Lenovo provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.
